title: Quick Demo: Learn How to Learn
description: A quick 2-question demo of the meta-learning quest. Perfect for demos and walkthroughs.

steps.title: What is Meta-Learning?
steps.description: A quick intro to learning how to learn.

conceptCard.title: Learning how to learn is the most valuable skill
conceptCard.body: Once you master meta-learning, you can learn anything faster and more effectively.

steps.title: Quick Knowledge Check
steps.description: Answer 2 questions to complete the demo quest.

questions.question: What is the main principle of spaced repetition?
questions.explanation: Spaced repetition works by reviewing information at increasing intervals (1 day, 3 days, 1 week, etc.)

questions.question: True or False: Re-reading notes is more effective than testing yourself.
questions.explanation: Active recall (testing yourself) is more effective than passive re-reading, even though it feels harder.

badge.name: Demo Learner
badge.description: Completed the quick demo quest and answered 2 meta-learning questions.
